name: Mountain Panic
overview: In this game you play as Bill the explorer who finds himself all alone after an Antarctic snowstorm, with only a scrap of paper from a colleague's notebook which mentions a mysterious sign broken into 4 pieces to go on. You must go deep inside the mountains to collect the 4 star pieces. Mountain Panic was inspired by the 1931 H. P. Lovecraft novella At the Mountains of Madness, and was programmed by Dave Footitt.
